note.p: MS found with a specimen of Spiranthes australis (MEL 2153812). MS annotation by M: 'Answ 17/3/91'. Letter not found.

div.p: Baron F. von Mueller C.M.G. F.R.S. etc.

I herewith enclose a few specimens of an orchid I found growing on the marshy flats and low banks near the Crookwell River about 30 miles from Goulburn N.S.W. I would be pleased to have the exact name if not asking too great a favor as I know your time is so fully occupied. Thanking you in advance

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
